data.name: 0000 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Say, Brigade Chief.

data.name: 0001 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Huh, it's pretty rare for you to refer to me that way.

data.name: 0002 (094.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's only because the mood is right, and it's fitting for what I want to talk about.

data.name: 0003 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, it's just… There's something I want to ask you, as the brigade chief.

data.name: 0004 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Can't we do this later? We're in the middle of something here.

data.name: 0005 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Come on, don't say that.

data.name: 0006 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What I want to ask about is whether anyone will ever inherit the position of brigade chief.

data.name: 0007 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: There's obviously no way that's ever going to happen.

data.name: 0008 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: There's only one SOS Brigade Chief! It's simply impossible for it to be anyone but me.

data.name: 0009 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That may be true, but…

data.name: 0010 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We submitted this club to the school as a hobby group and stuff.

data.name: 0011 (094.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well, not that we were accepted, anyway.

data.name: 0012 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: And so next year, we might have some new students join, right?

data.name: 0013 (094.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Not that I believe in the possibility even one bit.

data.name: 0014 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What's more—eventually we'll have to graduate and leave it all behind.

data.name: 0015 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: When that time comes, what do you plan to do about the members who get left behind?

data.name: 0016 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Right… Well by that point, the SOS Brigade will have expanded into a worldwide organization.

data.name: 0017 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Huh…?

data.name: 0018 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: They could always inherit this place as the original SOS Brigade birth site.

data.name: 0019 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But when the time comes…

data.name: 0020 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …we definitely might need to choose a successor.

data.name: 0021 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Of course, it would only be proper for the interviews to be conducted by yours truly.

data.name: 0022 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We can't afford to accept anyone short of the perfect candidate, you know?

data.name: 0023 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But then again, I'm not sure if someone who can live up to my standards even exists.

data.name: 0024 (094.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah, is that so?

data.name: 0025 (094.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I wonder if she'll still be dragging me around, working me to death even then.

data.name: 0026 (094.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I really don't want to dwell on that thought…

data.name: 0027 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: S-Suzumiya!

data.name: 0028 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hm? What is it, Mikuru?

data.name: 0029 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Umm, the, umm…

data.name: 0030 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Why did you suddenly call out to me?

data.name: 0031 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: U-uhh…

data.name: 0032 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Just spit it out! If there's something you want to say, then cut to the chase already!

data.name: 0033 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-it's just…

data.name: 0034 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Wh-what are the qualifications to become brigade chief?!

data.name: 0035 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …Huh?

data.name: 0036 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Wh-what? Is that maybe a weird thing to ask?!

data.name: 0037 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmmm… So you're looking to become brigade chief?

data.name: 0038 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's a surprisingly bold thing for you to say, Mikuru.

data.name: 0039 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ehh, no, i-it's not like that—

data.name: 0040 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's fine, I'll tell you.

data.name: 0041 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: You will…?

data.name: 0042 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: In order to become the SOS Brigade's illustrious chief, you must…

data.name: 0043 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: You must…?

data.name: 0044 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: First, you must defeat me!

data.name: 0045 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eek?! Defeat you?!

data.name: 0046 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Of course!

data.name: 0047 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: In ancient Rome, becoming the new emporer meant overthrowing the previous one!

data.name: 0048 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ehhhh?!

data.name: 0049 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The SOS Brigade works the same way!

data.name: 0050 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Only those whose strength I've tested myself are worthy of becoming our next brigade chief.

data.name: 0051 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: With that said—I'll accept your challenge anytime, Mikuru.

data.name: 0052 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I don't particularly wan—

data.name: 0053 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Oh yeah! Call Koizumi and Yuki over and we'll have a tournament!

data.name: 0054 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Nah, I'm just messing with you.

data.name: 0055 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The status of SOS Brigade Chief—it's a unique and irreplaceable way of life.

data.name: 0056 (094.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Of course. I understand what you mean.

data.name: 0057 (094.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: What is an SOS Brigade Chief?

data.name: 0058 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's a strange thing for you to ask, Yuki.

data.name: 0059 (094.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The nature of its being is of great interest.

data.name: 0060 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm, right. Well, if I were to sum it up…

data.name: 0061 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's me, Haruhi Suzumiya!

data.name: 0062 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The objective of the SOS Brigade is to liven things up in the world.

data.name: 0063 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Why you ask? Because I want to have fun, of course.

data.name: 0064 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Our goal is to gather all the mysteries of the world and bring them to me one after another!

data.name: 0065 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Personally, I think that would make things way, way more exciting for everyone.

data.name: 0066 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You get me?

data.name: 0067 (094.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I understand the objective.

data.name: 0068 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Alright, great. So do your best as a brigade member, alright Yuki?

data.name: 0069 (094.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Understood.

data.name: 0070 (094.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I've wanted to ask something for a while.

data.name: 0071 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What is it, Koizumi?

data.name: 0072 (094.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Your prospects—or rather—your long-term plan for the position of SOS Brigade Chief.

data.name: 0073 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm, I see. Certainly you would be curious, as a brigade member yourself.

data.name: 0074 (094.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Yes. Ideally, I'd like to continue my activity within the SOS Brigade for as long as possible.

data.name: 0075 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's a great attitude to have.

data.name: 0076 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If I had to sum it up in just one word… Maybe globalization.

data.name: 0077 (094.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Globalization… is it?

data.name: 0078 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yep. Right now, we're still only occupying North High along with the surrounding area.

data.name: 0079 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'd like to expand our territory bit by bit. We'll first spread through all of mainland Japan.

data.name: 0080 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: From that point, I plan to continue spreading our activities all around the world.

data.name: 0081 (094.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Worldwide expansion… As expected of Miss Suzumiya—a greater visionary than us all!

data.name: 0082 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: At the end of the day, simply staying active doesn't mean much.

data.name: 0083 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The crucial part is that we're able to verify the hidden mysteries of the world.

data.name: 0084 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I—the SOS Brigade Chief—will confirm these secrets with my own eyes.

data.name: 0085 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If we can do that much, the world will be way more fun and interesting—I'm sure of it!

data.name: 0086 (094.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I didn't realize you had such magnificent plans.

data.name: 0087 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: With that being said, Koizumi…

data.name: 0088 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I hope you'll continue your outstanding service from here on out!

data.name: 0089 (094.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed. I'm always prepared to give my all.

data.name: 0090 (094.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Good answer! That's exactly why you were chosen as an SOS Brigade member, after all.
